select step2.empNo , step2.name , step2.photo , step2.deptName , step2.jobName , step2.email , step2.tel , step2.cmpName , step2.remark from (select rownum rm , step1.empNo , step1.name , step1.photo , step1.deptName , step1.jobName , step1.email , step1.tel , step1.cmpName , step1.remark from (select EI.emp_info_emp_no as empNo , EI.emp_info_name as name , EI.emp_info_phto as photo , DI.dept_info_name as deptName , JI.job_info_name as jobName , EI.emp_info_email as email , EI.emp_info_mtel as tel , CI.cmp_info_name as cmpName , null as remark from (select case when emp_info_name < '가' then 15 when emp_info_name < '나' then 1 when emp_info_name < '다' then 2 when emp_info_name < '라' then 3 when emp_info_name < '마' then 4 when emp_info_name < '바' then 5 when emp_info_name < '사' then 6 when emp_info_name < '아' then 7 when emp_info_name < '자' then 8 when emp_info_name < '차' then 9 when emp_info_name < '카' then 10 when emp_info_name < '타' then 11 when emp_info_name < '파' then 12 when emp_info_name < '하' then 13 when emp_info_name >= '하' then 14 end as indexNum , emp_info_emp_no , emp_info_name , emp_info_phto , emp_info_dept_code , emp_info_job_code , emp_info_email , emp_info_mtel , emp_info_cmp_code , emp_info_edat from emp_info ) EI inner join dept_info DI on (EI.emp_info_dept_code = DI.dept_info_code) inner join job_info JI on (EI.emp_info_job_code = JI.job_info_code) inner join cmp_info CI on (EI.emp_info_cmp_code = CI.cmp_info_code)
EI.emp_info_edat is null

AND upper(EI.emp_info_email) like '%' || upper(#{email}) || '%'
AND EI.emp_info_mtel like '%' || #{tel} || '%'
order by EI.emp_info_name ) step1 where rownum <= (#{nowPage} * #{perPage}) ) step2 where step2.rm >= (#{nowPage} * #{perPage} - #{perPage} + 1)
